column3: IOE, UCL’s Faculty of Education and Society
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis Master's programme will deepen students' knowledge of child development and developmental psychology and prepare them for professional work with children and young people or progression to professional doctorates, higher research degrees, or employment as a researcher.About this degreeThis programme provides a high-quality education in the main theories, methods, and findings of psychological research relating to child development. The programme aims to enable independent learning and an approach to developmental psychology that is both informed and critical. Participants have the opportunity to conduct research that contributes to the field of child development.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
